quote_last: “How does it look?” Peretz was asking. He and Bill Bates had just climbed aboard the Sikorsky, cold and gray in the light fog.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_first: Why it felt important to know the time she didn’t know, other than to try and root herself in the midst of this chaos.
quote_last: So many people would have been eating breakfast, getting ready for work or the Passover holiday.
title: The Little Wartime Library
author: KateThompson
